Skrillex’s debut studio album, Recess (OWSLA/Big Beat), was released on March 21. Now streaming on iTunes via "First Play," Recess features collaborations with Diplo (Dirty Vibe), Chance the Rapper (Coast is Clear), Niki & the Dove (Ease My Mind), and others. According to reports in USA Today and Rolling Stone, the album was released as a surprise via an app, “Alien Ride,” to correspond with his upcoming tour and contained a folder with 11 hidden objects. 

"Recess" is Available now on: 

iTunes: ‪http://smarturl.it/SkrillexRecess 

or Beatport: ‪http://bgbe.at/SkrillexRecessBeatport
